thread.title: Yes, You Can Go to Jail for Listening to Ed Sheeran​
thread.title_full: Yes, You Can Go to Jail for Listening to Ed Sheeran​

author: jnosek1
title: Yes, You Can Go to Jail for Listening to Ed Sheeran​
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Anytime one is subjected to listening to Ed Sheeran , the person responsible should be jailed. That opinion may not be backed by the court of law, but we’ll settle for this one case in which a British woman was incarcerated for just that. 
Sonia Bryce recently received an eight-week jail sentence for playing Ed Sheeran’s “Shape of You” over and over again at high volume, according to ITV . Bryce—who hails from Willenhall in the West Midlands of England—was already subject to a court order secured by her landlords to prevent her from creating a nuisance or annoyance. She had already been arrested several times for violating the court order before she put the baby-faced redhead on repeat for half an hour, leading to inevitable complaints from her neighbors.
